title: Nicki Minaj or Poetry? | Guests: Rep. Chip Roy & Tina Ramirez | 9/17/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the controversy surrounding Nicki Minaj and her statements on the COVID vaccine. Glenn plays a game: “Shakespeare or Nicki Minaj?” Rep. Chip Roy joins to discuss the influx of Haitian immigrants at the Texas border. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, including the crisis at the border, President Biden's shocking speech statement, and an upcoming rally in Washington. Nancy Pelosi admitted that China is actively committing genocide, but thinks working with China on climate change is more important. Virginia congressional candidate Tina Ramirez joins to discuss woman’s rights in Afghanistan, Nancy Pelosi, and religious freedom.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
